main event: A report on an unidentified flying object sighted in Chicago over a span of several minutes on May 6, 1954.
interesting points: The object was first noticed as a stationary light in the sky before moving in various directions., The object had an elongated shape and a bluish color., The sighting lasted for approximately 4 minutes., The reporting officer used binoculars for observation., The conditions during the sighting were clear with few clouds.
sighted object: a stationary light that changed into a bluish elongated object
witness description: The reporting officer who observed the object through binoculars.
